sourcesContent:
/** @format */

export const CVDesc = [
	'A French native, Yannick received his formal culinary training in a renowned Michelin-starred restaurant in Lille at the age of 16 and apprenticed in Pastry. He developed a profound culinary knowledge in the kitchen with a specialisation in pastry, before taking up his first chef de cuisine position at the Regal Kowloon Hotel in Hong Kong at the age of 27.',
	'Chef Yannick has more than 30 years of experience, with exposure working in Europe, Asia and the Middle East. This has allowed him to develop a comprehensive understanding of Asian and international cuisines, both classical and modern, which he delivers with gourmet flair.',
	'Most recently Executive Chef at Morgan Stanley Hong Kong from December 2008 to April 2022, chef Yannick’s role saw him manage his team in a corporate environment. This included working on a broad range of events, from business lunches to summits and conferences for both internal and external stakeholders across the APAC region.',
];

export const CVApproach = [
	'Client first; understands the objectives, core values and vision of the company',
	'Follows and adheres to the principle of think, do, measure, correct and improve continuously',
	'Result-oriented, adopt actions to circumstances to obtain the best possible results',
	'Creates a dynamic structure in the kitchen; focuses on fresh seasonal products, quality processes and resources',
	'Hands-on; coaches and leads a team to bring out the best in its members; experienced in team building and training',
	'Adept at managing budgets and achieving targets',
];

export const CVFuture = 'Looking for opportunities based in Hong Kong or the APAC region overseeing sites in a Corporate, Hospitality, or Sports & Leisure working environment in which to deliver first-class meals that take nutritional value and customer needs into account.'

export const ExpItems = [
	{
		title: 'Executive Chef',
		loc: 'Morgan Stanley (Sodexo), Hong Kong',
		period: 'December 2008 – April 2022 (13 years and 4 months)',
		img: 'ms-HKG.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.morganstanley.com/about-us/global-offices/asia-pacific/hong-kong',
		cert: ['morgan04.png', 'morgan02.png', 'thankyouLetter.png'],
		certDesc: ['Recommendation Letter by Operations Director Raymond Moore', '10 Years Long Term Service Award', "Thank You emails from Executive Director, Morgan Stanley Marketing Jeanne Zee"],
		desc: "In charge of the in-house culinary team of 22 chefs at Morgan Stanley’s ICC office, which spans 15 floors: L30 to L47 and L86, including managing daily food operation and offerings for approximately 3,000 Morgan Stanley employees, with on-site production of dishes spanning Chinese, Japanese, Indian, Western and South-East Asian cuisines.",
		ach: [
			"Supervise and ensure all services meet client’s standards and expectations at all times and for all outlets operating breakfast, lunch, afternoon tea and dinner",
			"Manage ongoing culinary theme promotions featuring different cuisines to keep patronage high, with a total of 1,800 transactions daily",
			"Coordinate two teams to operate various amenities including: Outlet team in charge of Mosaicc restaurant, coffee bar and lounge, two traders’ pantries, one floor of corporate service (L86); and Catering team in charge of Executive Floor and Conference Centre.",
			"Create broad and robust food portfolio and deliver meals for internal and external business and corporate events including to Executive Floor, which offers numerous business set lunches, cocktail receptions, buffets, bento set menus and various cuisines across 16 meeting rooms, 12 training rooms, and an amphitheatre accommodating up to 120 guests",
			"2009 – Pre-opening phase, planned and implemented F&B budgets, recruiting, training, HSE standard and menu offering",
			"2010 – Planned and designed pastry room",
			"2010 – Coordinated corporate event with Jean-Francois Piege in Singapore",
			"2010 – Staff development – team member participated in the Sodexo World Class Chef programme in Boston, US",
			"2010–2020 – Part of annual Asia Pacific and annual summit conference for Morgan Stanley, Hong Kong and Singapore",
			"2010–2020 – Coordinated corporate events with celebrity chefs in Hong Kong, China, India, France and Singapore",
			"2010–2020 – Continuously supported Sodexo and Morgan Stanley with sourcing from WWF sustainable fisheries and reducing carbon footprint",
			"2011 – Part of the culinary exchange programme for Sodexo Prestige, Paris (Microsoft / Canal+ / MEDEF)",
			"2011 – Led staff development in which a pastry chef successfully obtained the certificate of pastry from Germany and VTC Hong Kong",
			"2011 – Coordinated with Pierre Gagnaire for a VIP menu Lunch for 350 guests, and a dinner for 20 guests in Singapore",
			"2012–2018 – Part of the Sodexo Global chef programme with major clients in Shanghai, Boston and Manila (Johnson & Johnson / Microsoft / Fordham)",
		]
	},
	{
		title: 'Executive Sous-Chef',
		loc: 'Fota Island Resort (Sheraton), Cork, Ireland',
		period: 'May 2006 – November 2008 (2 years and 6 months)',
		img: 'fota-IRE.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.fotaisland.ie/',
		cert: ['sheraton.png'],
		certDesc: ['Recommendation Letter by Executive Chef Neil Foster'],
		desc: "In charge of daily operations at the 130-room resort, including breakfast, lunch and dinner, and menu planning for the two restaurants, banqueting facilities for up to 250 covers, and room service for the outlets. In charge of full operations during the absence of the Executive Chef.",
		ach: [
			"Pre-opening kitchen-hotel team",
			"Management and organisation of the kitchens with a staff of 25 chefs and 7 stewards",
			"Ensure kitchen operations adhere to the HACCP system",
			"Recruitment and training of new staff members",
			"Develop menu concept based on Mediterranean cooking style",
			"Execute smooth running operations of the fine dining restaurant",
			"2006 food cost target of 28.4%; achieved 27.5%"
		]
	},
	{
		title: 'Chef de Cuisine',
		loc: 'Arabian Court, One & Only Royal Mirage, Dubai, UAE',
		period: 'November 2002 – November 2005 (3 years)',
		img: 'OneOnly-DBI.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.oneandonlyresorts.com/royal-mirage',
		cert: ['mirage01.png', 'mirage02.png', 'mirage03.png'],
		certDesc: ['Thank you Letter by by Executive Chef Paul Lenz', 'Recommendation Letter by Executive Chef Paul Lenz', 'Testimonial by Executive Sous Chef Jörg-Peter Nödler'],
		desc: "In charge of daily operations and menu planning for the luxury beachfront hotel’s Arabian Court kitchens, including Rotisserie restaurant, which features an interactive show kitchen, The Samovar lounge, room service operations for 170 rooms, and banqueting production for up to 400 guests.",
		ach: [
			"Pre-opening kitchen-hotel team",
			"Management and organisation of the kitchens with a staff of 25 chefs",
			"Approximately 800 daily covers for breakfast, lunch and dinner",
			"Implementation of new menu, with concentration on product, taste, texture and presentation",
			"Responsibilities include all aspects of kitchen administration, staff training, and maintaining food costs",
			"Budget objectives were achieved every fiscal month/year through careful planning, forecasting based on provided budget, and optimising product usage and efficiency",
		]
	},
	{
		title: 'Chef de Cuisine',
		loc: 'Restaurant Margaux, Shangri-La Jakarta, Indonesia',
		period: 'April 2001 – April 2002 (1 year)',
		img: 'shangri-la-IDN.jpeg',
		link: 'https://www.shangri-la.com/jakarta/shangrila/',
		cert: ['shangrila02.png', 'shangrila01.png'],
		certDesc: ["Recommendation Letter by Executive Chef Sean Macdougall", "Recommendation Letter by Executive Sous Chef Michael Gremer"],
		desc: "Restaurant serving French cuisine with an Asian twist. Lunch included a semi- buffet with a range of elegant cold and hot appetisers, while a selection of main dishes was served a la carte. Dinner was more refined, catering to a higher-end clientele.",
		ach: [
			"Re-opening kitchen–restaurant team (April 2001)",
			"Management and organisation of the kitchens with a staff of 10 chefs",
			"Approximately 80 daily covers for lunch and dinner",
			"Responsibilities included all aspects of kitchen administration, staff training, maintaining food costs, inventory control and enforcing hygiene policies",
			"Implementation of new ingredients and projection towards improving the quality and standard of the product",
			"Assisted Banquet Operations catering for 10 to 3,000 covers"
		]
	},
	{
		title: 'Chef de Cuisine',
		loc: 'French restaurant and wine bar, Regal Kowloon Hotel, Hong Kong',
		period: 'January 2000 – March 2001 (1 year and 3 months)',
		img: 'regal-HKG.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.regalhotel.com/mobile/regal-kowloon-hotel/en/home/home.html',
		cert: ['regal01.png', 'regal02.png'],
		certDesc: ['Recommendation Letter by General Manager Brian W. Dechant', 'Recommendation Letter by Food and Beverage Manager Karl G Karlsson'],
		desc: "Fine dining French restaurant offering regional and traditional French cuisine and Asian-influenced dishes. The restaurant was adjacent to a wine bar serving 400 ready-to-drink wines, one of the largest collections in Asia, complete with banqueting area.",
		ach: [
			"Management and organisation of the kitchens with a staff of eight chefs",
			"Approximately 80 daily covers for lunch and dinner",
			"Responsibilities included all aspects of kitchen administration, staff training and maintaining food costs",
			"Implementation of new menu with concentration on local tastes, traditional dishes and presentation",
			"Support Master Chef promotions and Winemaker dinners from different parts of the world",
		]
	},
	{
		title: 'Sous Chef & Pastry Chef',
		loc: 'Lucknam Park Hotel & Spa, Bath, UK',
		period: 'April 1998 – December 1999 (1 year and 8 months)',
		img: 'lucknam-UK.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.lucknampark.co.uk/',
		cert: ['lucknam.png'],
		certDesc: ['Recommendation Letter by Head Chef Paul Collins'],
		desc: "Countryside Relais & Chateaux property with three F&B outlets including a fine dining restaurant featuring modern and contemporary French cuisine.",
		ach: [
			"Nominated top ten best restaurant in England, 1998 with chef Paul Collins, executive chef",
			"Maintain the food production and standard of the food quality in different point of sales of the property",
			"Assist the executive chef in monitoring cost, kitchen stocks, orders, internal requisition",
			"Fully in-charge of the daily operation of the pastry department and menu planning"
		],
	},
	{
		title: 'Chef de Partie Sauce & Pastry',
		loc: 'Charlton House & Spa, Bath, UK',
		period: 'April 1997 – April 1998 (1 year)',
		highlight: '1 Michelin star; 3 AA Rosettes',
		img: 'mulbery-UK.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.bannatyne.co.uk/hotel/charlton-house',
		cert: ['charlton.png'],
		certDesc: ['Recommendation Letter by Head Chef Trevor Brooks'],
		desc: "Country house hotel and spa bought and refurbished by the owners of British fashion brand Mulberry in 1996. The hotel re-opened in 1997, featuring 17 rooms and a fine dining restaurant, conservatory lounge and room service.",
		ach: [
			"Pre-opening kitchen-hotel team",
			"In charge of the daily production of the sauce section and butchery department",
			"Daily menu planning",
			"Responsibilities included enforcing the HACCP system and ordering",
			"Fine dining restaurant received Michelin star in 1998 under Executive Chef Trevor Brooks"
		],
	},
	{
		title: 'Chef de Partie, Rôtisserie & Pastry',
		loc: 'The Royal Berkshire (Hilton), Ascot, UK',
		period: 'February 1996 – March 1997 (1 year and 1 month)',
		highlight: '3 AA Rosettes',
		img: 'berkshire-UK.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.exclusive.co.uk/royal-berkshire/',
		cert: ['berkshire.png'],
		certDesc: ["Recommendation Letter by Executive Head Chef Jean-Claude Macfarlane"],
		desc: "Hotel of 63 rooms, suites managed by Hilton company, 15 minutes from Heathrow Airport. The main restaurant serving contemporary French cuisine a la carte, the pool bar, 9 conference rooms and banquet capacity up to 400 guests.",
		ach: [
			"In-charge of the daily production of the sauce section and butchery department",
			"Daily menu planning",
			"Responsibilities include re-enforce of the HAACP method, ordering"
		]
	},
	{
		title: 'Commis Chef & Pastry',
		loc: "L'Huîtrière, Lille, France",
		period: 'August 1992 – March 1995 (2 years and 7 months)',
		highlight: '1 Michelin star',
		img: 'huitre-lille.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.yourlittleblackbook.me/en/huitriere-lille-oyster-bar-rijsel/',
		cert: ['huitriere.png'],
		certDesc: ["Recommendation Letter by M. François Foissiet"],
		desc: "A fishmonger and accompanying French restaurant in the centre of Lille with more than 100 years of history. The highly regarded restaurant serves 80 to 90 covers daily, with a la carte and seasonal gourmet menus, and a private meeting room catering to up to 70 customers."
	},
	{
		title: 'Commis Chef & Pastry Trainee',
		loc: 'Le Crabe Tambour – Cambrai, France (Closed)',
		period: 'July 1989 – June 1992 (3 years)',
		img: 'huitriere-lille.jpg',
		cert: ['trainee1.jpg', 'trainee2.jpg', 'trainee3.jpg'],
		certDesc: ["Professional Aptitude Certificate for Chefs", "Professional Aptitude Certificate for Pastry Chefs", "Professional Studies Certificate for Hotellerie Collectivites Option A-Cuisine"],
		desc: "Restaurant capacity of 80 seats, opened for lunch and dinner. Menu a la carte mainly based on seafood.",
		ach: [
			"Formal training as Commis chef tournant",
			"Formal training as Pastry commis chef",
		]
	},
];

export const HealthFluff = "Chef Yannick has worked alongside a qualified nutritionist on various healthy eating initiatives, from weekly meal plans to nutrition guides, nutrition factsheets that include calorie count measurements for food and beverage produced on site, and a recipe book featuring healthy dishes to make at home."

]

	"Sourcing fish, meat and vegetables from certified sustainable sources",
	"Highlighting sourcing on menus to raise awareness among diners",
	"Replacing disposable tableware in pantries with biodegradable alternatives, such as bamboo chopsticks, wooden stirrers, corn - starch packaging and paper straws served only on request",
	"Removing aluminium trays for catering event orders",
	"Improving waste management procedures to encourage measurement of waste and recycling where possible"
]
